downloads.title: RealKcat - Catalytically Aware Enzyme Kcat predictor, trained on KinHub-27k (Manually-curated Enzyme Parameter Database)
description: The enzyme kinetic parameters kcat and Km were systematically curated from BRENDA and SABIO-RK (as of May 2024), resulting in a initial dataset of 30,442 kcat and 44,615 Km entries.
bulletPoints: 26,244 entries with both kcat and Km values

downloads.title: RC-Hydrolase
description: RC-Hydrolase is the first reactive center database for 3D structural data of catalytic/active sites and allosterically regulated regions within PDB-listed enzyme molecules.
It enables comparison and visualization of structurally similar yet functionally distinct active pockets.

downloads.title: HuMEnz
description: Human disease-linked metalloenzyme/metalloprotein database (HumEnz-1.0) containing sequence, structure, and function data.
